ValidationRule.description: if the type = eAAT Domo Dashboard New Persona and/or Brand Request, 'List of Personas' and 'List of Brands' field needs to be populated
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
$Setup.byPass__c.byPass_WFRule__c = FALSE,
RecordType.Name = 'CSI Requests', ISPICKVAL(Request_Type__c, 'eAAT Domo Dashboard New Persona and/or Brand Request'), ISBLANK(List_of_Brands__c ), ISBLANK(List_of_Personas__c )
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If submitting an eAAT Domo Dashboard New Persona and/or Brand Request, enter the List of Brands and Personas needed
